name: Da Koi
description:
Take control of the always hungry Nibbles whose only goal is to eat anything that moves. Unfortunately, most of the other pond dwellers aren't very keen on this idea and will run away on sight. Find and eat gems to internalise their colours, merge multiple colours, and then spit them out to create decoys to lure in similarly coloured prey.

This game was submitted to The Campus Game Jam 2022

Credits
